title: Emmerdale actor Asan N'Jie breaks silence on sacking after shocking Jamie Lomas brawl
text:

Emmerdale's Asan N'jie has finally broken his silence on the controversial fight that lost him his role on the soap.

The actor was sacked for threatening to stab and kill Hollyoaks star Jamie Lomas at the TV Choice Awards, and he was escorted off the premises after trying to throw punches.

Emmerdale bosses cited "unacceptable behaviour" for the 25-year-old's dissmissal.

Asan, who is said to have appeared drunk, bellowed at the 44-year-old: “Do you think you are a f*****g big man? I’m going to f*****g kill you. I’m going to f*****g knife you.”

(Image: WireImage)

The fight allegedly began when Asan made goading remarks at Kym Marsh's ex husband.

Asan has remained tight-lipped about the incident - until now.

Taking to Twitter yesterday evening, he posted a contemplative message putting a positive spin on the events and implying he was going to stick at acting.

"All the people who’ve reached out and had my back you’ll never know how much I appreciate you", he wrote.

"I’ve learned, I’ve grown and now I’m working harder than ever to finish what I started. Keep you’re circle tight and always fall forward! [sic]"

He added: "The universe tends to unfold as it should."

There were mixed responses to the tweet, as some followers stepped in to defend him, but some were repulsed by his threats to Jamie.

"So good to hear from you Asan. I was worried because it’s like you disappeared. You are human, we all make mistakes. The Universe will open many doors for you," said a supportive fan.

"Hope everything works out for you, you will be missed on Emmerdale, should have been given another chance", said another.

(Image: Daily Mirror)

(Image: Daily Mirror)

"Everyone makes mistakes it's how you learn from it is that matters it's part of growing, you will be ok, bigger and better things for you, bit disappointed with Emmerdale for how they handled it but you will be fine x," wrote another well-wisher.

But another user disagreed, questioning: "Disappointed with Emmerdale for how they handled it... Seriously?"

"His behaviour was disgusting", they added.

"I have no tolerance with people threatening others with knives - sorry I don’t want you back on the tv - you had your chance and blew it", claimed another.

(Image: Ana M Wiggins / SplashNews.com)

Despite his sacking, Asan still appeared in scenes on Emmerdale that he had already filmed as his character, Ellis Chapman.

Soap bosses confirmed that Ellis will be staying on screen for another six weeks as it would be “virtually impossible” to remove his character from the forthcoming storylines without cancelling episodes.

Emmerdale viewers took to twitter after watching Ellis return to the village - and some were disappointed to see his scenes.

(Image: ITV)

On viewer said: "Ellis on tv..... tut tut Emmerdale... should of cut his scenes."

"Didn’t think they were showing Ellis scenes," added another.

A third said: "It will be a good bye committee soon for ellis".

(Image: ITV)

A show source told the Mirror: “Asan will still appear in the episodes he has recorded which will air for the next six weeks or so.

“There have been some meetings to decide what to do and this seems the most sensible option. We regularly have to rewrite scenes due to cast sickness and so it is not as unusual as it sounds to be suddenly re-writing storylines.

“By next week we will be filming scenes which will help write out Ellis and explain his absence from the show for good.”
description: The disgraced actor was sacked after a public fight where he threatened to kill Jamie Lomas, and he has remained silent until now
